description:
ROR (Research Organization Registry) is a global, community-led registry
of open persistent identifiers for research organizations. ROR is jointly
operated by California Digital Library, Crossref, and Datacite.
name: ROR

resources.description: ROR (Research Organization Registry) is a global, community-led registry of open persistent identifiers for research organizations.

institution.description: The CDL was founded by the University of California in 1997 to take advantage of emerging technologies that were transforming the way digital information was being published and accessed. Since then, in collaboration with the UC libraries and other partners, we assembled one of the worldâ€™s largest digital research libraries and changed the ways that faculty, students, and researchers discover and access information.
institution.name: California Digital Library, University of California Office of the President
